EmailTemplate.description: Email Template for Work.com Continuing Employee Wellness Survey
EmailTemplate.name: Continuing Wellness Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Wellness Survey - Please Complete
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
To ensure the highest level of continued health and safety at your workplace, please take this survey to report your current health status.
Your responses are used only to determine whether you can continue to work in your workplace. The data is confidential and for internal use only.
The survey link is unique to you. Don't forward this email to others.
{{Survey}}
Thank you, and we appreciate your support and cooperation.
